Reviews.Title: “Great Location”

Reviews.Content: fantastically easy hotel 5 min walk parallel metro stop 2 stops las ramblas hotel clean friendly staff map touristy type found info boards leaflets lobby breakfast adequate huge array choice lunchtime abundance theatres stretch road thats youre little authentic spanish cafes selling real spanish tapas beer real prices honest youre barcelona dont spend ime hotel anyway visit las ramblas connect relatively effortlessly major sights ie la familia guell park port vell gaudi house dali museum etc etc etc million top sea definitely recommend flying bcn airport airports outside city time wasted love barcelona ive 5 times
